trans-unit.source: Provides a text description of a SOAP fault.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultReason> class contains a set of <xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultReasonText?displayProperty=fullName> objects, each of which contains a description of the fault in a specific language.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.FaultReason"></xref> class using the specified list of fault translations.
A list of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.FaultReasonText"></xref> objects; each object describes the fault in a specific language.
translations is `null`.
translations is empty or one or more items is `null`.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.FaultReason"></xref> class using the specified text element that describes the fault in a specific language.
An array of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.FaultReasonText"></xref> objects that correspond to fault descriptions in different languages.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.FaultReason"></xref> class using the specified fault description.
A description of the reason the fault occurred.
Gets the fault description in the language used by the current thread.
A translation is always returned.
If only one translation exists, it is returned.
If there is an exact match for a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, that is returned.
If there is a translation for a parent language of <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, that is returned.
Otherwise, the first translation in the set is returned.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.FaultReasonText"></xref> object that contains the fault description.
Gets the fault description in the specified language.
A translation is always returned.
If only one translation exists, it is returned.
If there is an exact match for a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName>, that is returned.
If there is a translation for a parent language of <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName>, that is returned.
Otherwise, the first translation in the set is returned.
A <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> object that specifies the language of the fault description.
The fault text in the specified language.
The <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> is `null`.
Returns the fault reason as a string.
A string containing the reason for the fault.
Gets a collection of fault descriptions in different languages.
A collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.FaultReasonText"></xref> objects, where each object describes the fault in a different language.
